definition: clock/o'clock/time as measured in hours and minutes/bell/CL:架[jia4],座[zuo4]

sentences.english: Both the siphon trap and bell are one piece with no seams or glued joints.
sentences.chinese: 虹吸存水彎和鐘罩都是一體式的，沒有縫隙或膠合處。

sentences.english: This paper proposes an automatic calibration system of bell prover gas calibration facility.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種鐘罩式氣體流量標準裝置自動檢定系統。

sentences.english: Chapter Three focuses on the practical significance of The Bell Jar.
sentences.chinese: 第三章着重於《鐘罩》的現實意義。
